publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2538 Malcolm Chisholm: ‘Our National Health’ - Delivering Change—That the Parliament welcomes the progress made by the Executive and the contribution of NHS staff towards delivering the commitments in Our National Health: A Plan for Action, a Plan for Change published in December 2000 but recognises the long-term nature of the Plan and reaffirms its commitment to the various longer-term goals, including major reductions in waiting times and significant public health improvements. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*
